Istana Menimang Tandem Menteri Nadiem
05 Nov 2019, 07:35 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Mendikbud) Nadiem Makarim menjadi salah satu menteri yang tidak mendapat pendamping wakil menteri. Meski nantinya akan mengurus anggaran hingga Rp 508 triliun, Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) masih membiarkan Nadiem untuk bekerja sendiri.
Namun, Menteri Sekretaris Negara Pratikno mengatakan Presiden Jokowi akan berbicara dengan Nadiem untuk membahas mengenai pos tersebut. Hingga saat ini, Jokowi belum membuat keputusan terkait posisi wakil menteri untuk Nadiem Makarim.
"Jadi sampai sekarang ini presiden belum memutuskan. Nanti pasti akan bicara dengan Mendikbud," kata Menteri Sekretaris Negara Pratikno di gedung Krida Bhakti, Jl Veteran III, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Aturan mengenai Pos Wakil Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan sudah tertuang ketentuannya dalam Peraturan Presiden (Perpres) Nomor 72/2019 tentang Kemendikbud. Pratikno memastikan posisi wakil menteri akan segera terisi jika dibutuhkan.
"Belum ada. Kalau ada pos posisi kan iya, tapi kan tidak berarti harus selalu diisi. Tapi kalau dibutuhkan, tentu saja akan diisi," ujar Pratikno.

The Menimang Palace Tandem Minister Nadiem
05 Nov 2019, 07:35 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Minister of Education and Culture (Mendikbud) Nadiem Makarim became one of the ministers who did not get a deputy minister's assistant. Even though he will manage the budget up to Rp 508 trillion, President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) still allows Nadiem to work alone.
However, Minister of State Secretary Pratikno said President Jokowi would speak with Nadiem to discuss the post. Until now, Jokowi has not made a decision regarding the position of deputy minister for Nadiem Makarim.
"So until now the president has not decided. Later, he will definitely talk to the Minister of Education and Culture," said Minister of State Secretary Pratikno at the Krida Bhakti building, Jl Veteran III, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
The rules regarding the Deputy Minister of Education and Culture are stipulated in the Presidential Regulation (Perpres) No. 72/2019 concerning the Ministry of Education and Culture. Pratikno ensured that the deputy minister's position would be filled immediately if needed.
"Not yet. If there is a pos, right, but that doesn't mean it has to always be filled in. But if needed, of course it will be filled," Pratikno said.
